title: 4th COVID-19 jab from Monday (9)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Minister of Health Prof. Channa Jayasumana says that steps have been taken to inoculate the masses with the 4th dose of the COVID-19 vaccine.
Accordingly, the Minister said that the relevant inoculation program will be launched next Monday (9).
Steps have also been taken to give the second dose of the vaccine to children between the ages of 12 and 16, the Minister added.
